ticket_id='CHR-150A9474' program_id='CBTRN02C' section='purpose' issue_type=<IssueType.VAGUE: 'VAGUE'> description="The purpose summary mentions 'validates using XREF-FILE and ACCOUNT-FILE' but does not specify the validation rules (e.g., card number lookup, credit limit check, expiration date check). It also states 'posts valid transactions by updating ACCOUNT-FILE and TCATBAL-FILE balances' without detailing the specific balance updates (current balance, cycle credit/debit, category balance)." guidance='Expand the purpose summary to include key validation rules (card lookup, credit limit, expiration) and specify which balances are updated (account current balance, cycle credit/debit, transaction category balance).' priority=<IssuePriority.CRITICAL: 'CRITICAL'> created_at=datetime.datetime(2026, 1, 18, 17, 4, 30, 926756) resolved=False resolution_notes=None

ticket_id='CHR-2DA9CF81' program_id='CBTRN02C' section='business_rules' issue_type=<IssueType.INCOMPLETE: 'INCOMPLETE'> description='Only four business rules are documented (BR001-BR004). Missing rules include: handling of transaction type (credit vs. debit) for cycle credit/debit updates, logic for creating vs. updating TCATBAL-FILE records, and the condition for setting RETURN-CODE based on reject count.' guidance="Add business rules for: 1) How transaction type (DALYTRAN-TYPE-CD) determines whether ACCT-CURR-CYC-CREDIT or ACCT-CURR-CYC-DEBIT is incremented. 2) Logic for creating new TCATBAL-FILE record when READ returns '23' vs. updating existing record. 3) Rule for setting RETURN-CODE to 4 when WS-REJECT-COUNT > 0." priority=<IssuePriority.HIGH: 'HIGH'> created_at=datetime.datetime(2026, 1, 18, 17, 4, 30, 926765) resolved=False resolution_notes=None

ticket_id='CHR-83B2594A' program_id='CBTRN02C' section='outputs' issue_type=<IssueType.MISSING: 'MISSING'> description='The output for DALYREJS-FILE lists copybook as null, but the source shows FD-REJS-RECORD with FD-REJECT-RECORD and FD-VALIDATION-TRAILER fields. ticket_id='CHR-A635BCB6' program_id='CBTRN02C' section='error_handling' issue_type=<IssueType.INCOMPLETE: 'INCOMPLETE'> description="Error handling entries are generic (e.g., 'File status not '00' on opens, reads, writes, rewrites, closes'). Missing specific error codes and actions for different statuses (e.g., '23' for TCATBAL READ indicating record not found, which triggers create logic)." guidance="Detail specific file status checks and corresponding actions, especially for TCATBAL-FILE READ where '23' is expected and handled by creating a new record, not as an error." priority=<IssuePriority.MEDIUM: 'MEDIUM'> created_at=datetime.datetime(2026, 1, 18, 17, 4, 30, 926774) resolved=False resolution_notes=None
